fun.connor.lighter.compiler.generator.endpoint

Class MethodParamMarshalGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.compiler.generator.endpoint.MethodParamMarshalGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Statement

    public class MethodParamMarshalGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Statement
    Java source code generator for repeatable logic that marshals method parameters from raw data. This generator and ParameterMarshallerGenerator are responsible for generating the runtime code that deserializes types for use in endpoint methods. This class is responsible for assigning the Java variables to store the deserialized data (including handling wrapping data in Optional when required).

    • Constructor Detail

      • MethodParamMarshalGenerator

        public MethodParamMarshalGenerator(LocalVariable destination,
                                   Expression source,
                                   Expression contentType,
                                   TypeAdaptorFactoryGenerator typeAdaptorFactory,
                                   LighterTypes types)
        Construct a generator. The generator requires a LocalVariable as a destination for the marshaled type, an expression which produces the data to be marshaled, an expression which produces the IANA Media type to be used for this deserialization, and a generator for the TypeAdapterFactory in order to use it for type deserialization.
        Parameters:
        destination - the local variable to which the deserialized data will be assigned
        source - an expression that produces the serialized data
        contentType - an expression which produces a String IANA Media type of the serialized data
        typeAdaptorFactory - a generator for a TypeAdapter factory to use for deserialization
        types - type utilities

    • Method Detail

      • make

        public com.squareup.javapoet.CodeBlock make()
        Make a block of code that marshals the source expression into the destination variable. The code block generated will be multiple lines of Java source code. This method will generate local variables which are not exposed otherwise. It attempts to avoid possible collisions between its internal variables and the variables of other generators by applying slight name mangling.
        Specified by:
        make in interface Statement
        Returns:
        the statement as a JavaPoet CodeBlock
